mapper.insert: insert into quiz_question(course_id, question_text, question_type, correct_answer, explanation, difficulty_level, create_time, update_time) values (#{courseId}, #{questionText}, #{questionType}, #{correctAnswer}, #{explanation}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update quiz_question set
course_id = #{courseId},
question_text = #{questionText},
question_type = #{questionType},
correct_answer = #{correctAnswer},
explanation = #{explanation},
difficulty_level = #{difficultyLevel},
update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
